title: T-fal Optigrill XL
description:
30% larger grill surface!

T-Fal Optigrill Plus XL uses precision grilling technology to ensure perfect grilling results from rare to well-done every time.
 
Sensor cooking technology automatically adapts cooking time according to food thickness 4 temperature settings for grilling all types of vegetables and fruits,6 convenient cooking programs with preset cooking temperature and cycles: burgers, poultry, sandwiches, sausage, red meat, and fish

Optigrill features: 
-  Frozen food function defrosts and cooks all types of food
-  Manual cooking function for cooking vegetables or personal recipes.
-  Angled plates for easy fat release
-  Touch panel interface on handle for simple operation
-  Improved ergonomics and visibility 
-  Temperature controlled
-  Removable drip tray 
-  Removable plates
